Configure Jump Button Dialog Box

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System

From the front panel, right-click a Jump Button control and select Configure Jump Button from the shortcut menu to display this dialog box. This dialog box also appears if you add a new Jump Button to the front panel.

Note  You must save the VI before you add a Jump Button to the front panel.

Use this dialog box to configure a Jump Button control.

This dialog box includes the following components:

  • Button Text—Specifies the text that appears on the button. The default is Jump.
  • Target VI—Specifies the VI the button jumps to when pressed. LabVIEW populates this pull-down menu with VIs owned by the project library that owns the VI on which you place the Jump Button. You also can browse to any VI on disk.
